references.paper_title: A brief introduction to weakly supervised learning
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational overview of weakly supervised learning, which is directly relevant to the context of multi-instance partial-label learning.

references.paper_title: Multiple instance classification: Review, taxonomy and comparative study
references.reason: This paper offers a comprehensive review of multi-instance learning, a fundamental concept underlying the research presented in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Multiple instance learning: A survey of problem characteristics and applications
references.reason: This paper provides a survey of multi-instance learning, which is essential background for understanding the challenges and applications relevant to the main topic of the target paper.
This paper is highly influential in the field of partial-label learning, a crucial element in the multi-instance partial-label learning problem addressed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Multi-instance partial-label learning: Towards exploiting dual inexact supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of multi-instance partial-label learning, which is the central topic of the target paper.
